Class Hotel

java.lang.Object
Hotel
public class Hotel extends Object
This class represents a hotel containing the classes rooms and reservations

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Hotel(String name)
    Hotel Constructor where the amount of rooms is not provided and is automatically assigned 1 room

    • addModifiedDates

      public void addModifiedDates(int start, int end, double rate)
      Adds modified dates and their corresponding rates to the hotel's collection of modified dates.
      Parameters:
      start - the starting date
      end - the ending date
      rate - the rate to be applied to the modified dates

    • getModifiedDates

      public Map<Integer,Double> getModifiedDates()
      Returns a map containing the modified dates of the hotel.
      Returns:
      a map with integer keys representing the date and double values representing the modification factor

    • getRoomNumberOnType

      public List<Integer> getRoomNumberOnType(String type)
      Returns a list of room numbers based on the specified room type.
      Parameters:
      type - the room type to filter the room numbers
      Returns:
      a list of room numbers that match the specified room type
